actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 1H-Pyrazole-5-carboxamide,N-[2-fluoro-5-[[3-[(1E)-2-(2-pyrid inyl)ethenyl]-1H-indazol-6-yl]amino]phenyl]1,3-dimethyl-.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on a specified chemical.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 1H-Pyrazole-5-carboxamide,N-[2-fluoro-5-[[3-[(1E)-2-(2-pyrid inyl)ethenyl]-1H-indazol-6-yl]amino]phenyl]1,3-dimethyl-.
